welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Commerce! Known for its charming small-town feel and bustling local shops, we invite you to explore all that our city has to offer and enjoy the warm hospitality of our community."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Whiteman Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and convenient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Daugherty Field Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is used for general aviation and private aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport offers a comfortable and convenient experience for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Torrance Airport caters to private and corporate flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest of the main terminals at LAX, serving primarily Southwest Airlines and some international carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A mid-sized terminal serving primarily Delta Air Lines and some international carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A mid-sized terminal serving primarily American Airlines and some international carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The largest and newest of the main terminals at LAX, serving primarily American Airlines and some international carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: A mid-sized terminal serving primarily Delta Air Lines and some international carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: A mid-sized terminal serving primarily United Airlines and some international carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: A mid-sized terminal serving primarily United Airlines and some international carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: A mid-sized terminal serving primarily United Airlines and some international carriers.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: The main international terminal at LAX, serving a variety of international carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium WiFi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Monica Airport offers a variety of services for travelers, including a restaurant, gift shop, and rental car counters.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Santa Ynez Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Santa Ynez Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Secondary terminal for domestic flights

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal handles all air freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
